author: gumb00
content: Are there any tests yet for EIP-6780 SELFDESTRUCT only in same transaction ?

author: marioevz
content:
Check out this PR please: https://github.com/ethereum/execution-spec-tests/pull/122

You can fill using 
```
fill --until=Cancun --evm-bin=/path/to/evm/t8n ./tests/cancun/eip6780_selfdestruct/test_selfdestruct.py
```

author: marioevz
content: Made some fixes which should now contain all the correct expected outcomes! Please fetch and retry ðŸ™‚
